attributes.action: lower the amount in weeks that a pregnant woman can recieve the new payment of £190
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at present a pregnant woman can recieve the new payment of £190 towards food or other costs at 25 weeks upwards.However many feel that this should be lowered to at least 16 weeks of pregnancy when it is even more crucial for a woman at the beginning to feed her baby the nessacary nutrients. Especially if she has a history of premature births.
